title: KSI brings dog identical to Logan Paul's dead pet to press conference
text:
KSI brings dog on stage to intimidate Logan Paul (Picture: Reuters/Tom Jacobs)

In a bid to intimidate Logan Paul before their fight next month, KSI (real name Olajide William ‘JJ’ Olatunji) brought a dog onstage that was almost identical to Logan Paul’s recently deceased Pomeranian.

It all went down at their pre-fight press conference held at the Troxy in East London on Monday evening.

Host of the press conference, True Geordie, (real name Brian Davis) brought the YouTube stars on stage for some good old fashioned trash talking.

And the boys did not disappoint.

Logan Paul at the pre-fight press conference (Picture: Reuters/Tom Jacobs)

Logan Paul came out on stage first dressed head to toe in black, complete with a beret and silver chain.

Then KSI came out, but he was holding a little ball of fur, which bears a striking resemblance to Logan Paul’s Pomeranian, Kong da Savage, who was killed by a coyote in April.

Logan Paul saw it and immediately remarked: ‘That poor dog is terrified. You’re predictable. I bought treats.

‘Can we get this dog the stage, bro?’ he added.

Logan Paul tries to feed KSI’s dog a treat (Picture: Reuters/Tom Jacobs)

Unphased, KSI addressed the crowd saying: ‘Welcome to London, motherf*****!’

He then announced he’s calling the lookalike King Kong and gets the crowd to chant his dog’s name.

Then the trash talking started.

KSI said: ‘I can’t wait to finish you off, bro. He used his dead dog for views, he used a dead guy for views, a parrot death for views – is there anything that dies that you won’t use for views? That you won’t exploit?’

‘Maybe your career after I’m done with it,’ he added.

Logan later responded: ‘Man, I might kill this man. I might end you. I’mma light you on fire.’

KSI and Logan Paul on stage (Picture: KSI/YouTube)

True Geordie then asked both YouTube stars: ‘What’s your prediction for the fight?’

Logan confidently shot back: ‘First round decapitation.’

The rematch is due to take place at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Saturday 9 November.

The first match ended in a majority draw following six rounds of sparring – in an evening which also saw Logan’s brother Jake Paul go head to head with KSI’s brother Deji.
